analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Corollaries to the Law

original: 7.20. Ajjhattattika🔽Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ajjhattattika  na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca na bahiddhā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Section on the Triad in the Chapter on the Conditions🔽Internally homogeneous🔽A homogeneous internal state is not a condition, as condition by way of root, for an internal state.🔽A homogeneous external state is not a condition, as condition by way of root, for an external state. (Abbreviated.)
In the case of root cause, there are two … In the case of the unspecific, there are two.
